feature.label: ILTIS Testing -Testing Tools Feature
feature.description: Use this feature along with the IFS CDT-Testing Feature. This feature provides syntax highlighting for .rts and .awts (C++ code for testing) files and also an outline for these. Also usefull is the show-ofset plug-in helping to determine offests of given nodes in .rts file or in C/C++ Editors. Install this feature directly into your PDE Eclipse.
